openAlertDialog(Alert.AlertType, String, String, String) - Static method in class model.util.DialogBoxes
This static method shows a dialog box and is useful for presenting errors to the user
openGame() - Method in class controller.ViewController
Opens a currently loaded game, whether it is completely new or loaded from a file.
openHelp() - Method in class controller.ViewController
This method opens a new window with information about the application.
openHelp(Stage) - Method in class model.util.DialogBoxes
This method launches a new FXML window for the Help and starts a new HelpController.
openJavaDoc() - Method in class controller.ViewController
This method opens a new window with the JavaDoc.
openJavaDoc(Stage) - Method in class model.util.DialogBoxes
This method launches a new FXML window for the JavaDoc.
openMetadataDialog() - Method in class controller.ViewController
This method opens a dialog box where the user can enter meta data.
openNewGameDialog(GameOfLife, Stage) - Method in class model.util.DialogBoxes
This presents the new game dialog to the user and lets choose a game
openOptions() - Method in class controller.ViewController
This method opens a option dialog where the user can set parameters such as colors.
openOptionsDialog(ViewController, Stage) - Method in class model.util.DialogBoxes
This method opens an options dialog box where the user can set colors for the game.
openPatternEditor() - Method in class controller.ViewController
This method opens the pattern editor when the user interacts with this function and pauses the animation of the current game.
openPatternEditor(GameOfLife, FileController, Stage) - Method in class model.util.DialogBoxes
This launches a new FXML window and starts a new EditorController
openStatistics() - Method in class controller.ViewController
This method opens a view to show statistics of the current board.
openStatistics(GameOfLife, Stage) - Method in class model.util.DialogBoxes
This launches a new FXML window and starts a new StatisticsController
openWavFile(File) - Static method in class model.filemanagement.otherformats.wav.WavFile
